feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.0
entry.content:
• Count Down Timers Added per request (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/506)
  • Fixed User Page (for those with logins to navigate properly - glitch in 7.2.2)
  • Fixed Halo around WhisparrV3
  • Provided a pre-loader area for sponsorship in the middle so doesn't start with a weird gap

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

@scr4tchy fix for dynamic paths for count downs.

  • Fix 'dashboard' link in setup & countdown for subpath case by @scr4tchy in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/507 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.0...7.3.1

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.2
entry.content:
• Apprise Notifications Fixed and Works!

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.0...7.3.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.3
entry.content:
Resolve Issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/508 (Dropdown lists in "Apps" page are unreadable when selected)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.2...7.3.3

User report this below and should be resolved (very rare issue)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.3.4
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.3.3...7.3.4

To resolve issue - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/510 (When putting the cursor over the Live Hunts Executed, the text goes blurry.)
